question:
[Janice] went to the mall, because she wanted to look for a present for her daughter, [Beverly]. [Gerald] went to his brother [Freddie]'s Birthday party [Dannielle] went shoe shopping with her sister [Beverly]. [Judy] enjoyed a homemade dinner with her son [Freddie] [Lawrence] and his Aunt [Janice] flew first class [Gerald] bought a steak dinner for himself and his brother [Lawrence]. [Oscar] was playing tennis with his sister [Dannielle]. Afterwards, he was planning on playing chess with his sister [Fay]. [Joseph]'s wife, [Judy], surprised him on his birthday. He could n't believe she pulled it off.
Question: How is [Fay] related to [Joseph]?
